song.title: Arcane Zone
song.info:
This is my 8th song made on Amiga 1200 with standard CPU (Motorola 020, 14Mhz).
The song has 8 channels and has been composed on DigiBooster 1.7.
All samples by me - also the vocal sample. ;)
The song comes from my "RetroBeat" album (2012) that is fully downloadable from here: yerzmyey.i-demo.pl/
Recorded from real hardware. (Stereo slightly modified).
Greetz to all AMIGA fans!
